items.title: At least 24 killed as army paraglider bombs Myanmar Buddhist festival
items.description: Locals tell the BBC the carnage has made it hard to identify victims of the military attack.

items.title: Key US and regional mediators join talks in push to end Gaza war
items.description: Steve Witkoff and Jared Kushner's arrival in Egypt comes after Hamas submitted a list of Palestinian prisoners it wants Israel to release in exchange ...

items.title: Israeli forces intercept new aid flotilla bound for Gaza
items.description: Activists on board nine vessels carrying food and medical supplies for Palestinians will be deported, Israel says.

items.title: Nigerian minister accused of forging qualifications resigns
items.description: The forgery allegations have sparked outrage among some Nigerians, following a newspaper expos√©.

items.title: Burkina Faso junta detains NGO workers for 'spying'
items.description: The security minister says the NGO "collected and passed on sensitive security information" - which it denies.
